milestones.title: Fulltime Opensource Contributor
milestones.description: I like opensource projects and contribute to them daily. I constantly search for ways to learn about Bitcoin.

milestones.title: Graduated from College
milestones.description: Sucessfully graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology.

milestones.title: Got an Internship Opportunity
milestones.description: Began working as an opensource contributor at "Summer of Bitcoin", where students get a chance to learn about Bitcoin and work with mentors.

milestones.title: Discovered Blockchain Technology.
milestones.description: Started learning about Blockchain Technology from the internet.

milestones.title: Started my Blog Website
milestones.description: Began documenting my journey on my perosnal blog website.
